text: is the name of a group of three Shinto gods Sokotsutsu no O no Mikoto (底筒男命), Nakatsutsu no O no Mikoto (中筒男命), and Uwatsutsu no O no Mikoto (表筒男命).Sesko, Markus. (2011). The Sumiyoshi sanjin are worshipped for help with sea and sailing. They are sometimes called the . Sumiyoshi taisha has four buildings for four kami— the three Sumiyoshi brothers and Empress Jingū.Nussbaum, Louis- Frédéric. (2005).
